column4: Na wo tsenenee ma ɔhen ne ba."

column2: "Ma ɔmfa tsenenee nhwɛ wo man do
column3: Na ɔmfa atsɛmbu nhwɛ w’abɔbɔfo do
column5: "Ma mbepɔw mfa asomdwee mbrɛ ɔman no
column6: Na akoko so mbra wɔ tsenenee mu."

column2: "Ewia na bosoom da ho wɔ hɔ yi
column3: Ma wonsuro wo wɔ mbasantsen nyinara mu."

column2: "Ma ɔmbra dɛ nyankom a ɔtɔ gu nkyɛkyɛr a woekruw do do: Dɛ nsu kɛse a ɔtɔ fɔw asaase."
"N’aber do na ma atseneneefo nyɛ prɔmprɔm; Na asomdwee pii mbra
column3: nkodu dɛ bosoom nnyi hɔ bio."

column2: "Ma onnya ahendzi so mfi po ho nkesi po ho
column3: Na omfi Esutsen no ho nkesi asaase ano."

column2: "Ma hɔn a wɔtse sar no do nkotow n’enyim; Na n’atamfo ntafer huntuma."
"Ma Tarsis na nsupruw mu ahemfo mfa ayɛyɛdze mbra: Na Seba na Seba ahemfo mfa akyɛdze."

column3: ma ahemfo nyinara ntwa nhwehwe n’enyim: Ma amanaman nyinara nsom no."
ma ɔngye no do; Na bɔbɔnyi a onnyi boafo no so."

column2: "Ma ɔngye hɔn mfi nhyɛdo na akatabansɛm mu; Ma hɔn bɔgyaa nsom bo wɔ n’enyi do:"

column3: na ɔno na wɔmfa Seba sika bi mma no: Na nyimpa mbɔ mpaa mma no daa; Wonhyira no adzekyee nyinara."

column2: "Wɔmma eburow piigyan mbra mbepɔw etsifi asaase no do; Na wɔmma no do aba nwosow dɛ Lebanon: Na ekuromfo nyɛ prɔmprɔm dɛ asaase do nkyɛkyɛr."
"Wɔmma ne dzin ntsena hɔ daa daa
column3: Na ewia wɔ hɔ yi wɔmma ne dzin nwɔw do; Na nyimpa nyinara nhyira hɔnho wɔ no mu; Amanaman mfrɛ no ɔhomkanyi."
Israel Nyankopɔn a No nkotsee na ɔyɛ anwanwadze no:"

column2: "Na nhyira nka n’enyimnyam dzin no daa daa; Na wɔmma n’enyimnyam nhyɛ asaase nyina ma. Amen
"Jesse ba David ne mpaabɔ abɔ adze."
